title: Energy security of 1.4bn Indians govt’s supreme priority: Goyal in Parliament
content: ​​On choice of oil suppliers, Piyush Goyal said “Diversifying our energy sourcing in keeping with objective market conditions and evolving international dynamics is at the core of our strategy to ensure this. All of India’s actions are taken with this in mind.” The remark stood out against the backdrop of US President Donald Trump’s claims that India had decided to stop the purchase of Russian oil to secure a trade deal.

title: 'At twilight of existence': 100-year-old man acquitted in murder case after 4 decades
content: A division bench of Justices Chandra Dhari Singh and Sanjiv Kumar, in a 23-page ruling dated Jan 21, tore into contradictions they found in the prosecution’s case — from unreliable testimony of two eyewitnesses to omissions in FIR and what the court called “inherent improbabilities.” Dhani Ram and co-accused Satti Din had been convicted under IPC sections 302 read with 34 for accompanying Maiku during the killing.

title: Anil Ambani undertakes not to leave country pending CBI-ED probes
content: When the bench told solicitor general Tushar Mehta, who was representing both CBI and ED, to take preventive steps to ensure that investigation into the alleged fraud was not impeded, Mehta said that there was a look out circular (LOC) against Ambani, indicating that any attempt to flee the country would be foiled at the airport.

title: India-US trade deal: How Delhi's behind-the-scenes push cracked Trump tariff wall
content: India and the US have reached a surprising trade deal, reducing tariffs on Indian goods to 18% after a year of strained relations. National Security Advisor Ajit Doval's quiet diplomacy in Washington was key, signaling India's refusal to be bullied while emphasising strategic partnership. This breakthrough eases tensions and paves the way for deeper economic ties.

title: Explained: What is Anthropic's AI tool that wiped $285 billion off software stocks in a single day
content: A swift market reaction, dubbed 'SaaSpocalypse,' saw software stocks plummet by $285 billion after Anthropic's AI assistant, Claude Cowork, launched new plugins.  The legal workflow automation plugin, in particular, triggered a selloff in legal tech and broader software sectors. Analysts now fear AI platforms are becoming direct competitors to existing software providers.

title: Willow by Cricbuzz to stream Team USA T20 World Cup 2026 matches free on YouTube
content: Willow by Cricbuzz has announced major updates for the 2026 season, including free streaming of all four Team USA matches at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup on YouTube for the first time. The platform has also partnered with Jomboy Media for creator-led alternate telecasts and unveiled a revamped, faster viewing experience across its apps and devices.

title: T20 WC: Why Pakistan can't afford a loss against associates - breakdown of each group
content: The T20 World Cup faces a potential India-Pakistan boycott, a first in 14 years, as Pakistan awaits government clearance. While a group stage clash is uncertain, the ICC urges a resolution. Pakistan's captain stated players will follow government directives. The tournament features 20 teams across four groups, with knockout stages planned.

title: 'Not getting justice': Mamata argues her own case in SC - what happened
content: West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee urged the Supreme Court to intervene in the electoral roll revision, alleging the state is being targeted and its people bulldozed. The top court issued notices to the Election Commission and the state's chief electoral officer, emphasizing that genuine persons must remain on the electoral roll.

title: Pinterest fires engineer who created layoffs tracker; CEO tells employees at townhall: I know..
content: Pinterest terminated engineers who developed an internal tool to track layoffs, a move CEO Bill Ready defended as obstructionist behavior. The company is undergoing a restructuring focused on AI, aiming to enhance personalized content and marketer tools amidst industry pressures and investor concerns about AI's impact on its business model.

title: Faith groups in UK say proposed Islamophobia definition will stifle free speech
content: A letter from the Hindu Council UK, Network of Sikh Organisations, Christian Concern, and Muslims Against Antisemitism and Faith Matters, says that the language used in the definition, which has been leaked, is “so vague that it is open to misuse by those who seek to limit freedom of speech”.

title: Kashmir BEd colleges face large-scale de-affiliation
content: According to the notification issued by UoK for the 2025-2027 session, only two colleges are recognised by National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE) and have invited applications from eligible candidates for admission to two-year BEd programmes. Syed Masroor Andrabi, chairperson of Chinab Valley College of Education, said BEd colleges in Kashmir stood at the verge of closure.

title: Student at Leicester’s De Montfort University stabbed to death
content: An ambulance took the man to Leicester Royal Infirmary but he died a short time later. An 18-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of murder and is currently in police custody. Detective Inspector Lorna Granville, senior investigating officer, said: “We know a lot of people came to the aid of the victim before emergency services arrived and we want to thank them for their help.”

title: OpenAl is reportedly seeing exit of senior-level employees after CEO makes it compulsory to use...
content: OpenAI is experiencing a significant exodus of senior researchers as CEO Sam Altman prioritizes ChatGPT development over long-term AI exploration.  Key figures, including a VP of research, have departed due to resource allocation disputes, with experimental projects reportedly sidelined.  This strategic shift, driven by intense competition, leaves some teams feeling marginalized and questioning their original research goals.

title: No breakthrough in crucial talks between Ladakh team, MHA
content: Asgar Ali Karbali, co-chairman of the Kargil Democratic Alliance, said detailed deliberations were held on statehood and the sixth schedule. “Before holding talks on these issues, we raised the issue of four youths who were ‘martyred’ in September last year and those who have been detained," he said. The first round of talks between the committee and Ladakhi representatives was held on Oct 22, 2025, in New Delhi.

title: J&K: CM Omar tables Jan Vishwas Bill; PDP accuses INDIA bloc member of breaking ranks
content: CM Omar, who also holds the charge of law, justice and parliamentary affairs, also introduced another bill — J&K Eliminating Discrimination Against Persons Affected by Leprosy Bill-2026. It seeks to amend relevant enactments to eliminate discrimination against or denial of equal treatment to persons affected by leprosy, and to prevent their segregation and exclusion.

title: Animal Park to begin mid-2027 shoot, Ranbir Kapoor to play double role
content: Filmmaker Sandeep Reddy Vanga has confirmed 'Animal Park', the sequel to his 2023 blockbuster 'Animal', will begin shooting in mid-2027. Vanga explained the title signifies a war between two brothers who resemble each other, with Ranbir Kapoor set to reprise his role as Ranvijay Singh and also play the antagonist Aziz.

title: NBA trade news: Miami Heat eyes Giannis and Ja without giving up Adebayo or Powell
content: Miami Heat is reportedly exploring a bold move to acquire both Giannis Antetokounmpo and Ja Morant before the trade deadline. The ambitious plan aims to secure the superstars without sacrificing key players like Bam Adebayo and Norman Powell.  This potential blockbuster trade, if successful, would significantly reshape the league's landscape.

title: Kayla Nicole opens up on emotional toll of dating Travis Kelce amid Taylor Swift
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are trying to stay out of the spotlight as they plan their future together while dealing with retirement rumors and legal trouble. Amid all the mess, Travis Kelce's ex girlfriend, Kayla Nicole's, controversial comments about what she went through while dating him has resurfaced amid her recent actions of trying to shade his relationship with Taylor Swift.

title: Leon Draisaitl named Team Germany flag bearer for Winter Olympics
content: Edmonton Oilers center Leon Draisaitl has been chosen as one of Germany's flag bearers for the Milan Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics opening ceremony. This honor recognizes his status as an NHL star and a role model for fairness in sports. Draisaitl, a first-time Olympian, will share the honor with ski jumper Katharina Schmid.

title: Top JeM operative among 3 shot dead in J&K ops
content: For several hours overnight, troops maintained a tight vigil using drones and ground surveillance before launching a final assault at daybreak. Both terrorists were killed in the morning operation, officials said. In Dichhar area of Kishtwar district, a suspected Pakistani terrorist was killed Wednesday evening in a running hunt across snowbound mountains.

title: Three-time All-Star Mickey Lolich dies at 85, Tigers mourn the loss of a pitching great
content: Detroit Tigers legend Mickey Lolich, a celebrated left-handed pitcher and hero of the 1968 World Series, has passed away at 85. Known as a workhorse and a tough competitor, Lolich's remarkable career included three All-Star selections and a World Series MVP. He remains a beloved icon for his heart and determination on the mound.

title: Art of the deal: How India turned from 'Maharaja of tariffs' to global trade hub
content: India strategically navigated global trade uncertainties by forging numerous bilateral agreements, diversifying export markets and securing preferential access. This proactive approach, exemplified by deals with the US, EU, UK, and Gulf nations, cushioned the impact of punitive tariffs and repositioned the nation as a resilient player in global supply chains, emphasizing leverage over confrontation.

title: ‘Excellent conversation’: Trump, Xi discuss trade, Taiwan, Iran & Ukraine over phone call
content: US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping held a significant phone call, addressing trade, security, Taiwan, Iran, and the Ukraine war. Trump described the discussion as "excellent" and "thorough," highlighting potential energy and agricultural deals. Both leaders emphasized the importance of maintaining a stable and positive relationship between the world's two largest economies.

title: ‘What will PM reply to?’ Cong reacts to PM's missed speech; calls it pointless without LoP's address
content: Congress on Wednesday said the bigger issue in the Lok Sabha was that Leader of Opposition Rahul Gandhi was not allowed to speak, as the Prime Minister’s reply depends on the LoP’s questions. Without this, no debate could take place. Opposition protests led to dramatic scenes and the adjournment of the House.

title: 'Won't be bullied, willing to wait out Trump's term for trade deal, Doval told Rubio'
content: India has finalized a significant trade deal with the US, a move that National Security Advisor Ajit Doval indicated India was willing to wait out President Trump's term for. Union Minister Piyush Goyal confirmed the agreement, emphasizing the protection of sensitive sectors like agriculture and dairy. Both nations aim to more than double trade to $500 billion by 2030.

title: T20 WC warm-up: Ishan Kishan secures opening spot as India crush South Africa by 30 runs
content: Ishan Kishan's explosive 53 off 20 balls powered India to a formidable 241/5 in their T20 World Cup warm-up against South Africa. Despite a strong fightback from the Proteas, led by Ryan Rickelton and Tristan Stubbs, India secured a 30-run victory. Nine Indian bowlers contributed to restricting South Africa to 210/7.

title: 'Getting better day by day': Rishabh Pant offers positive update on comeback
content: Rishabh Pant is recovering well and is optimistic about returning to cricket soon. He is working hard at the BCCI Centre of Excellence. Pant emphasizes the importance of his love for the game and support from others during his recovery. He believes in continuous improvement as an athlete.

title: If India stops buying Russian oil, what it could mean for Moscow’s revenues — explained
content: US President Trump's push for India to reduce Russian oil imports could significantly impact Moscow's revenue, potentially forcing price cuts. Recent data shows a notable decline in Indian purchases, with further reductions anticipated due to refinery maintenance and limited alternative buyers like China.  While India cites energy security, geopolitical pressures and alternative supply options are reshaping global oil flows.

title: Ghaziabad father 'clueless' about tasks in Korean game, says daughters tossed phones and jumped
content: Three minor sisters tragically died after jumping from their ninth-floor Ghaziabad apartment, reportedly influenced by an online Korean task-based game. Their father, unaware of the game's nature, recalled the middle sister's leadership. The girls, deeply engrossed in the game and Korean content, had limited mobile access recently, potentially causing distress. Investigations are ongoing.

title: U19 World Cup: Sooryavanshi shines as India outgun Afghanistan to reach final
content: India secured a spot in the ICC Under-19 World Cup final by defeating Afghanistan by seven wickets. Aaron George's century, along with half-centuries from Vaibhav Sooryavanshi and Ayush Mhatre, guided India to their highest successful chase in the tournament's history. They will now face England in the final.

title: Artemi Panarin’s extension demands complicates NY Rangers’ trade talks as the Olympic freeze begins
content: NHL's Olympic roster freeze looms, but Artemi Panarin's trade remains uncertain.  The star forward, sidelined for three games, is reportedly seeking a hefty $50 million contract extension, complicating deals.  While several teams are interested, Panarin's no-movement clause gives him significant control, with Florida and Tampa Bay facing cap challenges for a long-term commitment.

title: Operation 'Trashi-I': One terrorist killed in J&K's Kishtwar
content: Security forces neutralised one terrorist in Kishtwar during Operation 'Trashi-I'. This follows a series of encounters targeting Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Mohammad militants. Separately, two Pakistani terrorists, including a top JeM commander, were killed in a cave in Udhampur during Operation 'Kiya', concluding a prolonged gunfight.

title: Ghaziabad suicide: Father recalls girls’ Korea obsession, warns parents about game addiction
content: Three minor sisters in Ghaziabad died after allegedly jumping from a ninth-floor balcony, with a suicide note indicating their deep attachment to Korean online content and gaming. Their father recalled their pleas not to be separated from it. Police are investigating the incident, suggesting addiction to a Korean task-based game and recent mobile phone restrictions as potential factors.

title: Is your car’s suspension failing? Common signs you shouldn’t ignore
content: Your car's suspension signals its decline through subtle changes. Listen for harsher rides over bumps, excessive bouncing, and strange noises. Uneven tyre wear, pulling to one side, or increased body roll during turns are also critical warnings. Ignoring these signs on India's challenging roads can lead to discomfort and safety issues. Address them promptly.

title: Early Signs Of Oral Cancer: Oncologist urges attention to persistent mouth sores
content: Oral cancer often goes unnoticed due to subtle early symptoms and societal stigma around related habits.  Dr. Vijay Haribhakti highlights that persistent mouth sores, white or red patches, and lumps, especially those lasting over two weeks, require urgent medical attention. Early detection through vigilance and regular check-ups is crucial for successful treatment.

title: World Cup dream over for Samson? Surya confirms 'definitely Ishan' to open
content: India's T20 World Cup warm-up saw Ishan Kishan open alongside Abhishek Sharma, potentially impacting Sanju Samson's World Cup selection. Captain Suryakumar Yadav confirmed the opening pair, emphasizing the team's strategy. This move follows recent shifts in batting order, with Kishan's strong form and Samson's inconsistent returns influencing management decisions.

title: 'Mover, shaker, and beggars': Pakistan's national meltdown over the India-US trade deal
content: Perhaps, Pakistan felt it had returned to its older role of indispensable intermediary as New Delhi remained the insouciant child who refused to bow to Trump’s diktats. Overnight, the illusion shattered as Trump announced the US had reached a trade agreement with India lowering tariffs on India’s exports to 18%. While most of the details about the deal are still being worked out, that didn’t stop a full-blown meltdown on Pakistani (or South Asian) Twitter.

title: Tom Homan announces withdrawal of 700 immigration agents in Minnesota
content: Around 700 federal immigration officers are leaving Minnesota following increased cooperation from state and local authorities, particularly county sheriffs. White House border czar Tom Homan announced the drawdown, citing improved collaboration and a safer environment. This move comes amid protests and fatalities linked to earlier large-scale federal deployments in the state.

title: Explosive ‘candy’ injures 3-year-old girl in Rajasthan; shopkeeper detained
content: A three-year-old girl in Alwar's Ramgarh area sustained severe mouth and jaw injuries when an explosive, allegedly disguised as candy by a shopkeeper, detonated in her mouth. The child is recovering after surgery, and the shopkeeper has been detained for questioning as an investigation is ongoing.

title: Birthday balloons explode inside Mumbai lift, 2 injured; CCTV captures chilling moment
content: A young student, Himani Tapriya, sustained severe burns after dozens of gas-filled balloons exploded in a lift at Amol Tower, Goregaon. The incident occurred when a delivery man, Raju Kumar Mahato, entered the lift with the balloons. Police have registered a negligence case against the shop owner for failing to provide safety instructions to his employee, who also suffered injuries.

title: India-US trade deal decoded: What does it mean for economy, markets & Russian oil imports?
content: India and the US have announced a framework for a bilateral trade deal to strengthen trade ties, under which the US will cut tariffs on Indian goods to 18% from 50%. The Centre has clarified that agriculture and dairy remain protected, while sectors such as textiles, leather and gems may benefit.

title: Rahul's 'traitor' remark on Bittu snowballs into controversy - top developments
content: Rahul Gandhi's "traitor friend" jibe at BJP MP Ravneet Singh Bittu during a Parliament protest has sparked outrage. BJP leaders condemned the remark as unacceptable and offensive to the Sikh community, demanding an apology. Bittu retaliated, accusing Congress of atrocities against Sikhs and calling them "murderers."

title: Oppn, BJP MPs spar in Speaker office as Nishikant Dubey flashes 'Bofors' book in LS to target Gandhi family
content: Lok Sabha witnessed heated exchanges as opposition MPs protested BJP's Nishikant Dubey targeting the Gandhi family with book references. Following adjournment, Congress MPs met Speaker Om Birla, while Union Minister Kiren Rijiju was also present. This follows earlier disruptions over former Army chief's memoir and Rahul Gandhi's disallowed quotes.

title: AD to the Wizards?! Grading the shocking trade, and why one team came out on top
content: Anthony Davis joins Washington in an eight-player trade. Kevin Pelton breaks down what's next for the Wizards and the Mavericks.

title: NBA trade buzz: Live updates and intel during deadline week
content: Chris Paul is headed to Toronto, but will he stay there? Catch up on what we're hearing from insiders.

title: Sources: Mavs overhaul again, trade AD to Wiz
content: The Mavericks are trading 10-time All-Star Anthony Davis to the Wizards as part of an eight-player trade, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: Sources: Paul lands with Raptors in 3-team trade
content: Chris Paul, a 12-time NBA All Star, has landed with the Raptors amid a three-team trade involving the Clippers and the Nets, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: Sources: Sixers trade McCain to OKC for 4 picks
content: The 76ers are trading guard Jared McCain to the Thunder for a 2026 Rockets first-round pick and three second-round picks, sources told ESPN.

title: Sources: Bulls trade White, Conley to Hornets
content: The Bulls continued to overhaul their roster, sending guards Coby White and Mike Conley to the Hornets for Collin Sexton, Ousmane Dieng and three-second round picks, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: Hamlin reinjured in fall searching fire wreckage
content: Denny Hamlin says he plans to compete in the 2026 NASCAR season despite aggravating an existing shoulder injury in a fall while he was searching the damage from a house fire that killed his father.

title: Sources: Panarin traded to Kings, gets extension
content: The Rangers have traded forward Artemi Panarin to the Kings, who gave him a two-year, $11 million extension, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter and Emily Kaplan on Wednesday.

title: Darnold: Oblique 'feels really good' ahead of SB
content: With four days to go before Super Bowl LX, neither Seahawks coach Mike Macdonald nor Sam Darnold seems concerned about the quarterback's oblique injury.

title: Source: Cardinals' LaFleur hires Hackett as OC
content: The Cardinals are hiring Nathaniel Hackett as their offensive coordinator, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: High school stories of 11 Super Bowl stars -- and two coaches
content: Find out what Sam Darnold, Drake Maye, Cooper Kupp, TreVeyon Henderson and others were like before the NFL.

title: Who you calling old? At the 2026 Olympics, age is just a number
content: Lindsey Vonn, Nick Goepper, Gus Kenworthy and Maddy Schaffrick are in their golden years at the 2026 Olympics. Just don't call them old.

title: How Laila Edwards carved her own path as USA Hockey's first Black player
content: Laila Edwards, a standout at Wisconsin, is ready for her Olympic debut as USA Hockey's first Black player.

title: Ranking the top 12 men's Coach of the Year contenders at midseason
content: From Fred Hoiberg and the turnaround he's authored at Nebraska to usual suspects, see who made the short list.

title: Bracketology: The good, and the less good, about Illinois' recent success
content: The Fighting Illini are the top 2-seed -- with plenty of time this season to move further up the board.

title: Christian Gonzalez vs. JSN? Will Campbell vs. DeMarcus Lawrence? Sorting five key Super Bowl matchups
content: Can Christian Gonzalez contain Jaxon Smith-Njigba? Will DeMarcus Lawrence get the best of Will Campbell? Here are five matchups that will matter Sunday.

title: Our full list of Super Bowl LX picks: 58 experts predict the final score of Seahawks-Patriots
content: Will the Seahawks or Patriots win? Who will be the MVP? Our analysts and reporters make their predictions.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up ahead of trade deadline
content: Which players are under the most pressure and where all 30 teams rank a day before the Thursday trade deadline.

title: A do-over of the 2025 NFL draft: Let's redraft the first 64 picks, with changes starting at No. 2
content: Abdul Carter to the Jets? Tyler Shough to the Browns? Emeka Egbuka to the 49ers? We repicked the first two rounds of last year's NFL draft.

title: 12 teams that improved their 2026 CFP chances with their roster moves
content: With signing day closing many team's personnel moves, we look at the teams ready to make long postseason runs.

title: Inside James Franklin's rapid recruiting overhaul at Virginia Tech
content: In a sprint to the early signing period, Franklin gutted his former school and brought life to the Hokies.

title: Road to $1M paydays: How WNBA salaries evolved with each CBA
content: For the first time, a $1 million base salary is expected in the new WNBA CBA, and the cap could see a 230% increase.

title: Power Rankings: Can Texas exact revenge and snap LSU's win streak?
content: The Tigers seek to sweep a key series in the SEC, but the Longhorns look to avenge their loss in Baton Rouge from last month.

title: Soccer's newest superagent is doing things differently -- and he wants you to know it
content: Ali Barat is impossible to miss -- last summer's transfer window was dominated by his clients making big moves -- yet hard to track down. It's all part of his mystique.

title: How to bet the WM Phoenix Open: Target these Maverick McNealy, Si Woo Kim props
content: The fourth stop of the PGA Tour season brings us to Scottsdale, where we can expect to see plenty of birdies at the WM Phoenix Open.

title: Super Bowl LX expected to see highest ticket price since 2020
content: Vivid Seats projects the crowd split in Santa Clara on Sunday will be a 61-39 advantage toward Seahawks fans.

title: The art of the pregame outfit and the stylist behind the NFL's crossover with fashion
content: From pregame style to fashion week, NFL fashion editor Kyle Smith helps players level up their style.

title: NFC gets the win in 2026 Pro Bowl Games
content: From touchdowns to fun celebrations, here are the must-see moments from the 2026 Pro Bowl flag football game.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye France, Crystal Palace striker Mateta
content: Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta could be Manchester United-bound this summer. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Real Madrid's big transfer questions: What to do about Vini Jr., more
content: January transfer window was quiet, but there are plenty of issues for the club to address in the summer.

title: Ghostbusters: Back Darnold, Seahawks to exorcise some demons in Super Bowl LX
content: Liz Loza advises not to underestimate the revenge factor as Sam Darnold and the Seahawks face their New England demons in the Super Bowl

title: Wemby's minutes restriction, KAT's new offensive role, and more
content: A look around the league reveals the latest trends, from Victor Wembanyama's minute restriction to Karl-Anthony Towns' changing offensive role, and more.

title: From Harden and JJJ to Vucevic: Fantasy reaction to the latest NBA trades
content: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody provide fantasy reactions as trades go down leading up to the trade deadline.

title: Stevenson claims No. 1 spot in new division
content: Shakur Stevenson is the top-ranked fighter in two divisions following a dominant win over Teofimo Lopez Jr. Here are the latest ESPN divisional rankings.

title: U.K. asks Air India to explain Boeing Dreamliner fuel-switch incident
content: The U.K. Civil Aviation Authority warned of the possibility of regulatory action against Air India and its Boeing 787 fleet if the airline does not submit a complete response ​within a week

title: DVAC assures court of proper probe into ED’s plaint against Nehru’s dept.
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan reserve orders on two writ petitions insisting upon registration of a FIR

title: Andre Beteille: A sociologist with rigorous scholarship who laid emphasis on importance of fieldwork
content: Former colleagues and students recall his steadfast commitment to teaching at Delhi School of Economics, rigorous scholarship

title: Fake currency racket busted, four arrested in Andhra
content: The accused were printing counterfeit currency notes in Visakhapatnam district and circulating them in different places, say police

title: In his maiden speech in Rajya Sabha, Kamal Haasan calls Special Intensive Revision a ‘disease giving rise to many living dead’
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, referring to Mr. Hassan’s statement alleging that she had used derogatory words about the Tamil language in 2025, clarified that she had quoted Periyar E.V. Ramasamy Naicker and it was not her views.

title: Sivaganga custodial killing: Theft case against Ajith Kumar closed, CBI tells Madurai Bench of Madras High Court
content: The Central Bureau of Investigation closed the alleged theft of jewellery case as there was no evidence and no materials

title: Dramatic protests in Lok Sabha prevent PM’s reply to the motion of thanks
content: Congress says PM should give his reply only after LoP gets to speak; Congress MPs protest BJP MP’s “disruptive” reading from books making allegations against Jawaharlal Nehru, Indira Gandhi

title: Karnataka to roll out automated land mutation system Statewide
content: Mutations will be cleared automatically if no objections are raised within the stipulated notice period

title: Trinamool Congress, BJP engage in war of words in Rajya Sabha
content: From the State government’s alleged indifference toward Centrally sponsored schemes to road markings being painted in the TMC’s colours of white and blue instead of the universal yellow and black, the BJP and TMC traded charges in the Upper House

title: A ‘mischievous’ case filed against Minister Palanivel Thiaga Rajan, says Madras High Court
content: The case filed by a resident of Madurai accuses the Minister of having abused his position for unlawful gain with respect to a 2.26 acre land in Kodikulam village

title: Home Ministry, Ladakh leaders talks remain inconclusive
content: The October 22, 2025 draft proposal submitted by the group regarding Statehood and inclusion of Ladakh under the sixth schedule of the Constitution, thus giving it a tribal status, was discussed at the meeting

title: Indian cities could see far higher temperature rise than projected, says study
content: This means global warming is set to hit smaller Indian cities much harder than previously predicted; in Patiala, for instance, temperatures could rise at double the rate projected for surrounding rural areas

title: Piyush Goyal lost moral authority to continue as Minister, says Samyukt Kisan Morcha
content: The Union Commerce Minister’s statement in Parliament contradicts the claims of U.S. Secretary for Agriculture, says the farmers’ body

title: Assets worth ₹27.83 crore to be seized for FEMA violations
content: Kapil Aggarwal and Ms. Sangeeta Aggarwal ‘acquired and held 10 immovable properties in Dubai for a total consideration of AED 1,94,03,975’, the agency alleged

title: Supreme Court asks if Centre can reconsider Sonam Wangchuk’s detention on health grounds
content: The Additional Solicitor General submitted that the climate activist had made provocative speeches, which had led to violence in Leh in 2025

title: PM Modi to discuss ties during two-day visit to Malaysia
content: The PM will hold discussions with Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim and representatives of Indian community in Kuala Lumpur

title: Litigants can directly approach High Court if police station ‘rejects’ complainant, says Karnataka HC
content: The court says the procedure of approaching a superior officer and the Magistrate applies exclusively to cases of ‘refusal’ to record information and does not extend to cases of “rejection” of a complaint by a reasoned endorsement

title: Mamata Banerjee’s visit to Supreme Court was part of ‘scripted drama’: BJP
content: Mamata trying to derail SIR, influence votes based on 2024 voter lists, claims BJP LoP in State Assembly; State BJP chief says Trinamool compelled BLOs to upload false documents in the system

title: Victims recall horrific ordeal during communal violence in Chhattisgarh’s Gariaband
content: A large mob allegedly unleashed itself on the 10-odd Muslim families of Dutkaiya village, setting their houses on fire and forcing them to flee

title: Trinamool Congress hails Mamata Banerjee’s Supreme Court appearance as ‘big win’
content: From Ministers in the West Bengal government, to party MPs and spokesperson, several leaders of Trinamool Congress lauded the efforts of the party chairperson of arguing against SIR before the Supreme Court

title: CCI probes IndiGo for dominance abuse, fare hikes after December flight cancellations
content: Probe report to be submitted in 90 days; order after passenger complained of buying air tickets at double the price after IndiGo cancelled his flight

title: Every single genuine person must remain on electoral roll, CJI tells West Bengal CM in Supreme Court
content: Assuring CM Mamata Banerjee, the top Court said that the Election Commission of India cannot “run away” from its Constitutional obligation to ensure that “every single genuine citizen” is included in the electoral

title: Forest department uses tech to track tiger, ropes in Pune-based experts to tranquilise it
content: At least 100 forest department personnel are monitoring the movements of the tiger 24x7, apart from the deployment of the state-of-the-art technology to tranquilize it.

title: Civic poll campaign shifts to top gear in TG
content: CM A. Revanth Reddy launches campaign from Miryalaguda, BJP national president Nitin Nabin kick-starts poll campaign from Mahabubnagar

title: Kerala to fund ₹1,900 crore for Sabari rail project
content: Cabinet decides that the State will bear 50% of the cost of the Angamaly–Erumely Sabari Railway Project and raise its share through the Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board. The project — first proposed in the 1997-98 Railway Budget — has finally been set in motion after a hiatus of nearly three decades.

title: Water crisis threatens paddy fields in various panchayats in Thrissur; farmers warn of mass protests against KSEB
content: Farming in Kannukettichira–Vazhikkilichira polder worst affected. Ryots allege that crisis is triggered by KSEB’s failure in releasing water from its dams to irrigation system and warn of mass protest against the power utility

title: Tiger made eight cattle kills over three weeks in Yadadri Bhuvanagiri district
content: A special committee has been constituted to monitor the tiger’s movements and take decisions on the course of action to be adopted by the Forest department

title: Withdraw from India-U.S. trade deal: Minister
content: Flays letter from Centre demanding Kerala discontinue State Incentive Bonus provided for paddy procurement

title: M. Ravichandra to take charge as new TTD Executive Officer on February 6
content: Currently serving as Special Chief Secretary to the Chief Minister, he is entrusted with full additional charge of the new post following the transfer of incumbent Anil Kumar Singhal in the ghee adulteration case

title: Tirupati police arrest 13 for ‘abduction, assault’ of student union leaders
content: Student leaders Ali Akbar and Vinod Kumar, who were about to participate in a demonstration against Mohan Babu University (MBU), were allegedly abducted by some persons owing allegiance to the university

title: School health programme for holistic health, well being of students
content: Aksharam Arogyam programme will cover all students from Classes I to XII in all government and aided schools across the State. title: MMA divisional rankings: Benoit Saint Denis, Mauricio Ruffy rise at lightweight
content: Saturday's UFC 325 was headlined by a meeting between the No. 1-ranked featherweight, champion  Alexander Volkanovski , and No. 2  Diego Lopes , a fight won by the champ. But it was one weight class heavier where the fight card impacted the ESPN divisional MMA rankings. Lightweight  Benoît Saint Denis  knocked out  Dan Hooker  in the co-main event to move up three spots to No. 7. And in the fight right before that,  Mauricio Ruffy  scored a knockout of  Rafael Fiziev  to earn a place in the top 10. Those were the only changes in the rankings. Here are the  ESPN pound-for-pound MMA rankings  and a  list of current UFC champions  in all weight classes. Results are current; rankings as of Feb. 3. To be eligible for the rankings, a fighter must have competed over the past 12 months or must have an upcoming fight booked. Fighters who have been dropped for inactivity can be reinstated only after they compete.
